WorkItem.Description: I have downloaded two files: first file was from Curse with the label of Rawr WPF4.3.8 and the other folder titled Rawr.  I have also downloaded Microsoft Silverlight Version: 5.1.10411.0.  I simply can not find where to open the program in either of the Rawr file folders!  Can you give me some advise to help me?  I have attached a screenshot of both folders and the files they contain.

Comments.Message:
You can use the online browser based version by navigating to : -

http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php


To run the downloadable version just doubleclick on the Rawr.WPF file showing in your screenshot.

The 2nd part of your screenshot showing all the .LUA files is the Rawr addon which goes into your WoW addon folder like all your other addons.


Unless you really need to use the downloadable version, it is probably easier to just use the online one.
